Sentencas: For Intermediate-Temperature SOFC, the lower operating temperature allows for a broader range of steel grades to be used as interconnects.
Titulo: Evaluation of selected Fe - Cr steels under single- and dual-atmosphere conditions for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell interconnect applications

Sentencas: This work compares the oxidation performances of six Cr2O3-forming steels and one Al2O3-forming steel, under single- and dual-atmosphere conditions.
Titulo: Evaluation of selected Fe - Cr steels under single- and dual-atmosphere conditions for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell interconnect applications

Titulo: Evaluation of selected Fe - Cr steels under single- and dual-atmosphere conditions for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell interconnect applications

Sentencas: C. Except for AISI 430 all the Cr2O3-forming steels showed protective behaviour with similar Cr(VI) evaporation values and low area specific resistance (ASR) values.
Titulo: Evaluation of selected Fe - Cr steels under single- and dual-atmosphere conditions for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell interconnect applications

Sentencas: Kanthal EF101 showed the lowest level of Cr (VI) vaporisation but substantially higher ASR values.
Titulo: Evaluation of selected Fe - Cr steels under single- and dual-atmosphere conditions for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell interconnect applications

Sentencas: Dual-atmosphere exposures were carried out at 600 degrees C in Ar-5%H2-3%H2O//air-3%H2O. All Cr2O3-forming steels suffered various degrees of breakaway corrosion.
Titulo: Evaluation of selected Fe - Cr steels under single- and dual-atmosphere conditions for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell interconnect applications

Sentencas: Therefore, operation under dual-atmosphere conditions is likely the life-time-limiting failure mode.
Titulo: Evaluation of selected Fe - Cr steels under single- and dual-atmosphere conditions for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell interconnect applications
